mapper.sql: d_no, d_name, d_memo, d_default, d_compid, d_no1, d_no2, d_no3
mapper.update: update depot set d_name = #{d_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_memo = #{d_memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_default = #{d_default,jdbcType=BIT}, d_compid = #{d_compid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, d_no1 = #{d_no1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_no2 = #{d_no2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_no3 = #{d_no3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where d_no = #{d_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
